abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Frozen Orbs
about: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage
A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from a number of those projectiles instead

abilities.name: Slam
about: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow

abilities.name: Charge
about: Charges at player's location. This knocks the encounter back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance travelled

abilities.name: Summon Reflection of Varhesh
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Tar Orbs
about: Spawns damaging orbs that move towards player until they reach the target or expire
